## Block.setTooltip() method

Sets the tooltip for this block.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTooltip(newTip: Tooltip.TipInfo): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

newTip


</td><td>

[Tooltip.TipInfo](./blockly.tooltip_namespace.tipinfo_typealias.md)


</td><td>

The text for the tooltip, a function that returns the text for the tooltip, or a parent object whose tooltip will be used. To not display a tooltip pass the empty string.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void
